name: CaTrainStophe
description:
Aim for pedestrians across 3 rail tracks to fuel your train. Watch out for obstacles such as boulders and fallen logs, and keep in mind that your speed gets faster the more fuel you have. When you top off your fuel meter, you win!

This is my first ever complete and original game. I am aware the gameplay sucks, but I'm proud of seeing it through to the end at least.

All art and sound effects done my me. Music is "The Steam-Powered All-Electric Train" by Eric Yoon.

Software: Godot, Aseprite, Bfxr
